Name: Australasian Society for Ultrasound in Medicine

About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment. Reference assistance available in person and by telephone. No copying services available.

About.Access: Minimum age 18 years. Letter of request to visit and proof of identity required.

About.Acquisition focus: The Society was founded in 1970 and appropriate records and other archival material is kept. (95% in-house).

About.Major holdings: Australasian Society for Ultrasound in Medicine Minutes 1970-
